Message.Title: Coke= 100% Toxic
Message.Msg: Every ingredient in Coke is poison except the water!!! Do not drink this or buy this poison for your kids to drink. All this company cares about is profits, they cannot even put real sugar in Coke they have to use HFCS which is toxic and causes diabetes and other major health issues. HFCS is cheap and is the reason its used.
